summary: A troubled young man still mourning the childhood loss of his family now has to deal with his professor being turned into a monster.
cast: Robert Englund|Trevor Matthews|Daniel Kash|David Fox|Dean Hawes|Rachel Skarsten|James A. Woods|Ashley Bryant|Stefanie Drummond|Chad Harber|Patrick Henry|Meghanne Kessels|Meg Charette|Kristyn Butcher|Andrew Butcher|Simon Rainville|Matthew Stefiuk|Brennan Delaney|Valerie Casault|Austin MacDonald|Evan Gilchrist|Ariel Waller|John Ross|Victoria Fodor|Derrick Damon Reeve|Dani Kind|Joshua Bogues|Brad Gibb|Rick Bramucci|Rafael Petardi|Steve Stransman|Christina Sauvé|Melinda Gilhen|Mónika Balla|Allisa Boardley|Catherine Grgicakuk|Norman Mikeal Berketa|Blue|Jason Deline|Shawn Meunier
title: Jack Brooks: Cazador de Monstruos
